name: My Monster and Me
description:
Submitted as part of the GMTK 2021 Game Jam

Everything is better with your monster by your side.

You and your monster are going to face all the horrors of growing up.

- Navigate puzzles in two worlds
- Connect together and control the world
- Make the world a little safer, one switch at a time

Art: Jess (Ghirko) Howard
Story & Programming: Chris (NotQuiteCool) Sutcliffe

Controls

WASD - Move

SPACE - Jump

TAB - Swap Between Characters

CTRL - Activate Switch

CLICK - Connect
